docs.snippet: Union flags are constantly raising amid great enthusiasm. They are flying at half mast to day, in consequence of the decease of Senator DOUGLAS.

headline.main: French Views of the American Question.; PRIVATEERING. NEUTRALITY.

docs.lead_paragraph: The question of letters-of-marque has just been discussed with high authority in the English House of Lords. It is known that JEFFERSON DAVIS, the President of the Southern Confederacy, has not hesitated to employ even tail desperate means to further his audacious attack on the American Union.

docs.snippet: Gustor Lindenmuller, Plaintiff in Error, vs. The People, Defendants in Error. The decision in this case, affirming the judgment convicting the prisoner, was published in the TIMES of May 30.

headline.main: Constitutionality of the Sunday Law Opinion of the General Term.; SUPREME COURT GENERAL TERM. Before Justiced Clerke, Sutherland and Allen.

docs.snippet: MRS. WINSLOW'S SOOTHING SYRUP certainly does, as the name implies, "soothe" the little suffering into a quiet, natural sleep, from which it awakes invigorated and refreshed. And for the cure of diseases incident to the period of teething, such as...
docs.lead_paragraph: MRS. WINSLOW'S SOOTHING SYRUP certainly does, as the name implies, "soothe" the little suffering into a quiet, natural sleep, from which it awakes invigorated and refreshed. And for the cure of diseases incident to the period of teething, such as Dysentery, Diarrhoea, Wind, Colic, c., c., we have never seen its equal.
